item.title: Aspose.PDF for .NET 4.0.0.0 New Release Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.PDF for .NET 4.0.0.0 New Release Introduction In this release, the feature ‘PDF Linearization’ (sometimes called ‘Web Optimized’ or ‘Fast Web View’) is supported. The idea behind linearization is faster display of PDF documents downloaded from the web. If you’re developing a Web-based system that creates large PDF files for delivery to web browsers over the Internet, you should try to make sure that your system can generate linearized PDF files.
